title: Breitenstein - Old Mill Southern League - SOLD
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Breitenstein - Old Mill Southern League - SOLD
posts.post_content:
A nice example of Ted's New Orleans T206 card with the OMSL reverse.  Creased in the right lower corner.  Otherwise very nice "Good" example that is not graded.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10859/breitenstein-omsl-2[/IMG]

Asking SOLD.

Any form of no fee payment accepted or add $2 for regular Paypal.
